{"id":506858895,"lang":"cpp","time":"10 months, 1 week","timestamp":1623511538,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/506858895/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"10.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string convert(string s, int numRows) {\n        if (numRows == 1) return s;\n        vector<string> zigzag(numRows, \"\");\n        \n        int dir = 1;\n        int i = 0;\n        for (char c : s) {\n            zigzag[i].push_back(c);\n            if ((i == 0 && dir == -1) || (i == numRows-1 && dir == 1)) {\n                dir = (-1) * dir;\n            }\n            i += dir;\n        }\n        string ans;\n        for (string& s : zigzag) ans += s;\n        return ans;\n        // return accumulate(zigzag.begin(), zigzag.end(), \"\");\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion"}
